contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2013}} {{Use British English|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox road |country=GBR |type=A |route=97 |subtype=minor |length_mi= |direction_a= North |terminus_a = [[Banff, Aberdeenshire|Banff]] |direction_b= Southwest |terminus_b = [[Dinnet]] |junction = |destinations= }} The '''A97''' is a major [[road]] in [[Aberdeenshire (traditional)|Aberdeenshire]], [[Scotland]]. It runs south from [[Banff, Aberdeenshire|Banff]] on the north coast through [[Aberchirder]], [[Huntly, Scotland|Huntly]], [[Rhynie, Aberdeenshire|Rhynie]] and [[Mossat]] before terminating at its junction with the [[A93 road]] at [[Dinnet]]. {{UK primary routes 9}} {{coord|57.35452|N|2.81147|W|type:landmark_region:GB_dim:50000|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:9-0097}} [[Category:Roads in Scotland]] [[Category:Transport in Aberdeenshire]] [[Category:Articles lacking sources from June 2009]] [[Category:All articles lacking sources]] {{Scotland-road-stub}}
